overview: The soccer stadium Arena Corinthians was constructed in São Paulo’s Itaquera district, approximating the club structures to the biggest stronghold of its fans. Through filming the official tour at the arena and interviewing Corinthians soccer team supporters that live on its margins, the film shows the dubious relation that takes place between them.

production_companies.name: Escola de Comunicações e Artes, Universidade de São Paulo

tagline: Who actually gets to watch the matches?
title: By the People, For the People
